description: A film about an organization called Canada World Youth, which brings together young people from Canada and developing countries in Latin America, Asia and Africa. They live and work in an atmosphere of international fellowship and understanding. An NFB camera crew circled the globe, filming the program in Canada, Guatemala, Senegal, and Malaysia. The film tells of the rich and colorful experiences of the participants in this unique experience.
